entry.title: Dallas Power Lift Assist Recliner, Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 1379.00

Description

  • Upholstered in a soft, breathable, premium PU fabric
  • Lift feature is perfect for people with reduced mobility
  • Ergonomic power recline feature provides the functionality of choosing your reclining needs with the touch of a button
  • Attached hand-held remote with extend and retract settings to help you sit, lie down or stand up
  • Quiet motor powers a gentle moving, comfortable transition from full recline to lift
  • Comfortable pocket coil and padded, yet pillowy-soft foam cushion construction provide support and a soft, comfortable place to rest
  • Detailed piping around padded armrests and backrest add style
  • Side pocket keeps power remote and your favorite reading material tidy and organized
  • Only need 15.25" clearance from the wall to fully recline

The perfect solution to make life more accessible and enjoyable from the comfort of your own home. A pillow soft, yet firm cushion construction is wrapped in a premium PU fabric, making this ergonomic power lift assist recliner perfect for people with limited mobility. Choose your ideal comfort with the touch of a button, powering the quiet motor through gentle moving transitions to help you sit, lie down or stand up.

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 41"H X 33"W X 39"D
Product Weight 97 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 31"H X 32"W X 32"D
Carton Shipping Weight 109 lbs.
Max Weight 299 lbs.

entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 1049.00

Description

  • Upholstered in a soft, breathable, premium PU fabric
  • Power recline feature lets you choose your optimal viewing and comfort level from the built-in, stainless steel remote pad
  • USB port conveniently built in to remote pad to charge your devices without ever having to leave the comfort of your chair
  • Quiet motor powers a comfortable, seamless transition from full recline to upright seated position
  • Thick backrest cushions with added lumbar support are firm yet supportive for all day comfort
  • Wide square arms add presence and character while supporting high quality stainless steel cup holders
  • Wall hugger reclining design slides away from the wall requiring only 4" clearance to fully recline
  • Thick decorative, reinforced top-stitching outlining wide arm rests add detail to your space
  • Side pocket is perfect for storing remote controls, or for your phone or tablet while charging

Grab the popcorn and sink in to this home theater power recliner in the comfort of your very own home. This luxury chair is designed for all day comfort; supportive backrest cushions, wide arm rests, stainless steel cup holders on each side, and a convenient USB port to charge your devices. The wall-hugger design is perfect for smaller spaces, requiring only 4" clearance from the wall to fully recline. Kick back and relax as the quiet motor powers a seamless transition to your optimal comfort and viewing level. The perfect addition to your entertainment or living space.
